General.Name: Cruzeiro do Sul Educacional S.A
General.Description: Cruzeiro do Sul Educacional S.A. provides education services in Brazil. It offers academic and professional education services, including elementary school, undergraduate, graduate, and extension courses in on-site and distance learning modalities through 14 higher education institutions and five basic education institutions. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Cesário Galeno, 448/475, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 03071-000
